name: Acorn Clash
description:
Welcome to ACORN CLASH !

DISCLAIMER : The game’s only available language is French (you can still perfectly play it since there’s no text needed to be read during a game)

What happened to the title ?
The original title was Clash of Glands, Glands being the french word for Acorn, and pronounced in French like «Clans». So the title was a play on word with the famous Clash of Clans.

What’s the pitch ?
3 squirrels team up against a lumberjack to protect the forest ! They need to avoid the working man, regenerate trees, and build snaring traps with the help of their allies. The Lumberjack, on his side, has to cut down the trees and can use the gathered wood to place cages around the field.

How to play ?
You’ll need a party of 4 friends (play locally or using Parsec) with a controller for each person. Just Download the game and launch it. The actions are displayed in game when you start it. You’ll need to settle for a 1 Lumberjack + 3 Squirrels composition before everyone enters the center circle. You can control the global handicap if you feel the Lumberjack is too strong or too weak.
